comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content:
a fascinating distinction with these 4 ships is that each has a specific paint pattern on their funnels to help distinguish each other.  You can also see a large mounted # between some of the funnels. this indicates their position in the review.

The best thing about this photo is the hillside sign for Palisade Amusement Park, which places it opposite W 130 St in NY.
